name: Moveha Inc.
description: Developer of a rental website designed to offer reliable property information and reservation services. The company's rental website is integrated with a platform which helps the students to search and find off-campus housing as well as provides relocation options, sharing rooms or helps them in leasing their own properties, enabling students to find accommodations and relocate.
